content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace entity at position (52.0, -82.0) with copper-ore as input and copper-plate as output.
### Furnace at position (52.0, -84.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace entity at position (52.0, -84.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from non-existent entities
- Ensure that the entity from which you are trying to extract items exists and contains the items you are trying to extract.
### Errors when crafting items with unlocked recipes
- Research the required technology before attempting to craft items that require it.
### Errors when setting research
- Ensure that the research is valid and can be set before attempting to do so.
### Errors when extracting items from incorrect positions
- Make sure to extract items from the correct position where the entity containing the items is located.
